mapper.insert: insert into mg_sale_log (log_id, product_type, product_id, owner_id, sale_type, price, insert_time, insert_by) values (#{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select log_id, product_type, product_id, owner_id, sale_type, price, insert_time, insert_by from mg_sale_log where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
